reviews.review_msg: Very boring lecturer, very difficult to stay awake! She does not communicate well, although she is a very easy marker.
Denise is nice, but her teaching style is all over the place. I walked away learning nothing from her class.

Denise is a nice enough person but once she starts teaching all sense of logic and relevance flys out the window. This class may as well been distance ed cause she is completely useless, the only reason I didnt drop this course is cause it's manditory but if you can avoid if AVOID her!
What she taught was inspiring. She could largely raise students' interest in the subject and her class was my best class in my life so far. Her selected texts are excellent.
